segments.pli: “Chahi, bhikkhave, dhammehi samannāgato suṇantopi saddhammaṃ abhabbo niyāmaṃ okkamituṃ kusalesu dhammesu sammattaṃ.
segments.en: “Mendicants, someone with six qualities is unable to enter the sure path with regards to skillful qualities even when listening to the true teaching.

segments.pli: Kammāvaraṇatāya samannāgato hoti, kilesāvaraṇatāya samannāgato hoti, vipākāvaraṇatāya samannāgato hoti, assaddho ca hoti, acchandiko ca, duppañño ca.
segments.en: They’re obstructed by deeds, defilements, or results. And they’re faithless, unenthusiastic, and witless.

segments.pli: Imehi kho, bhikkhave, chahi dhammehi samannāgato suṇantopi saddhammaṃ abhabbo niyāmaṃ okkamituṃ kusalesu dhammesu sammattaṃ.
segments.en: Someone with these six qualities is unable to enter the sure path with regards to skillful qualities, even when listening to the true teaching.

segments.pli: Chahi, bhikkhave, dhammehi samannāgato suṇanto saddhammaṃ bhabbo niyāmaṃ okkamituṃ kusalesu dhammesu sammattaṃ.
segments.en: Someone with six qualities is able to enter the sure path with regards to skillful qualities when listening to the true teaching.

segments.pli: Na kammāvaraṇatāya samannāgato hoti, na kilesāvaraṇatāya samannāgato hoti, na vipākāvaraṇatāya samannāgato hoti, saddho ca hoti, chandiko ca, paññavā ca.
segments.en: They’re not obstructed by deeds, defilements, or results. And they’re faithful, enthusiastic, and wise.

segments.pli: Imehi kho, bhikkhave, chahi dhammehi samannāgato suṇanto saddhammaṃ bhabbo niyāmaṃ okkamituṃ kusalesu dhammesu sammattan”ti.
segments.en: Someone with these six qualities is able to enter the sure path with regards to skillful qualities when listening to the true teaching.”
